name: PersonalTrainer
0:
”Alexa, open personal trainer”
”Alexa, open personal trainer and start a workout”
”Alexa, open personal trainer and start a 20 minute cardio workout”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: personal trainer
des:
Personal Trainer recommends and plays follow-along workouts from a curated list of high quality workout videos. Recommendations are made based on user requirements. The following workout filters are supported currently -

* Workout type (cardio, yoga, stretching etc.)
* Duration (10 minutes, 20 minutes, 1 hour etc.)
* Muscle group (abs, legs etc.)
* Difficulty level (easy, medium, difficult)

The skill will search its repository of workout videos, ranks the videos based on your preferences and plays the top result. You can control the video playback using voice commands like pause, resume etc. which enables you to follow along the workout at your own pace.
